subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Perjury
lead_paragraph: Randy Velarde testified at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial that Bonds’s personal trainer, Greg Anderson, gave him injections of steroids and human growth hormone.
snippet: Randy Velarde testified at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial that Bonds’s personal trainer, Greg Anderson, gave him injections of steroids and human growth hormone.
